titleStmt.title: A treatise of election and reprobation in vindication of the universal grace and love of God to mankind by B.L.
titleStmt.author: Lindley, Benjamin, d. 1723.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by T. Sowle,

notesStmt.note: Pages 50-60 contain a reply to George Keith's Truth advanced.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
